document_data.name: Shandaril's Workbook
document_data.author: [[Shandaril]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shandaril's Workbook''''' was an [[arcane]] [[spellbook]] penned by vile [[wizard]] [[Shandaril]]. It contained 9 [[spell]]s ranging from common to unique or rare.
document_data.Description: Shandaril's Workbook was shaped like a crescent moon. It was five handwidths tall and three handwidths across. The front and back cover were glossy black ebony. [[Copper]] hinges held the workbook together at the curve of the crescent. The workbook contained 26 pages of thin copper sheets that contained 25 [[spell]]s.
document_data.Powers:
''Shandaril's Workbook'' contained the following spells:
:''[[burning hands]]'' • ''[[dancing lights]]'' • ''[[detect magic]]'' • ''[[hold portal]]'' • ''[[shocking grasp]]'' • ''[[sleep]]'' • ''[[spider climb]]'' • ''[[audible glamer]]'' • ''[[circle dance]]'' • ''[[detect evil]]'' • ''[[fool's gold]]'' • ''[[rope trick]]'' • ''[[shatter]]'' • ''[[skyhook]]'' • ''[[dispel magic]]'' • ''[[gust of wind]]'' • ''[[Leomund's tiny hut]]'' • ''[[suggestion]]'' • ''[[tongues]]'' • ''[[confusion]]'' • ''[[dimension door]]'' • ''[[firebrand (wizard spell)|firebrand]]'' • ''[[fumble]]'' • ''[[polymorph self]]'' • ''[[wall of ice]]
document_data.History: Shandaril hid a unique spell that she developed called ''[[Shandaril's tracer]]'' that allowed her to track down, and even ''[[teleport]]'' to, whoever carried her workbook. She deliberately allowed her workbook to be found by others so that she could hunt them down later and eliminate them as rivals while taking their magic.
